title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram - Exquisite Temple Inspired Grand Necklace
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Meticulously studded with CZ Diamonds
and Emerald gemstones. High-quality Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance and tarnish resistance.
features: Double-layered Kasula Haaram featuring exquisitely crafted Lakshmi motifs. The central pendant boasts a mesmerizing floral design with embedded ruby and emerald accents. Divine goddess Lakshmi embellished settings with exceptional details and intricate work. The design incorporates a modern geometric pattern in the necklace's main body, creating a unique blend of tradition and contemporary style. The lower pendant has the traditional gold pearl drop hangings.
colors: Predominantly gold with dazzling white from the CZ diamonds
complemented by vibrant touches of ruby red and emerald green. A classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
Sankranthi). It is also suitable for high-end parties and special events where you wish to make a statement.
description: This Lakshmi Kasula Haaram is a symbol of prosperity and divine blessings. A timeless piece meticulously crafted with traditional South Indian artistry and modern jewelry techniques. High-quality materials and attention to detail ensure durability and enduring beauty. Perfect for gifting to a bride or a loved one. Its unique design makes it a treasured family heirloom.
